languages.text: {n}Лицо сестры Сороритас смягчается. Она протягивает руку и легонько проводит по макушке девочки.{/n} "Слезы пройдут, Аделия. Слезы пройдут, силы вернутся, смелость не оставит тебя".
{n}Argenta's face softens. She reaches out and gently strokes Adelia's head.{/n} "The tears will pass, Adelia. The tears will pass, the strength will return, and your courage will never leave you."
languages.original_text: {n}Лицо сестры Сороритас смягчается. Она протягивает руку и легонько проводит по макушке девочки.{/n} "Слезы пройдут, Аделия. Слезы пройдут, силы вернутся, смелость не оставит тебя".

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta's face softens. She reaches out and gently strokes Adelia's head.{/n} "The tears will pass, Adelia. The tears will pass, the strength will return, and your courage will never leave you."

{n}Argenta's face softens. She reaches out and gently strokes Adelia's head.{/n} "The tears will pass, Adelia. The tears will pass, the strength will return, and your courage will never leave you."

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔的表情变得柔和起来。她伸出手，轻轻地抚摸着阿德莉雅的头。{/n}“泪水会过去的，阿德莉雅。泪水会过去的，力量也会回来。你的勇气永远不会离你而去。”
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's face softens. She reaches out and gently strokes Adelia's head.{/n} "The tears will pass, Adelia. The tears will pass, the strength will return, and your courage will never leave you."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔的表情变得柔和起来。她伸出手，轻轻地抚摸着阿德莉雅的头。{/n}“泪水会过去的，阿德莉雅。泪水会过去的，力量也会回来。你的勇气永远不会离你而去。”

languages.text: {n}El rostro de Argenta se suaviza. Estira la mano para acariciar con cariño la cabeza de Adelia.{/n} «Las lágrimas pasarán, Adelia. Las lágrimas pasarán, la fuerza volverá y tu valor nunca te abandonará».
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's face softens. She reaches out and gently strokes Adelia's head.{/n} "The tears will pass, Adelia. The tears will pass, the strength will return, and your courage will never leave you."

traits.locale_text: {n}El rostro de Argenta se suaviza. Estira la mano para acariciar con cariño la cabeza de Adelia.{/n} «Las lágrimas pasarán, Adelia. Las lágrimas pasarán, la fuerza volverá y tu valor nunca te abandonará».

languages.text: {n}アルジェンタの表情が和らいだ。彼女はゆっくりと手を伸ばし、アデリアの頭を優しくなでた。{/n}「涙はいつか枯れる、アデリア。いつか悲しみを乗り越えて、あなたはもっと強くなる。あなたの勇気は決してなくならない」
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's face softens. She reaches out and gently strokes Adelia's head.{/n} "The tears will pass, Adelia. The tears will pass, the strength will return, and your courage will never leave you."

traits.locale_text: {n}アルジェンタの表情が和らいだ。彼女はゆっくりと手を伸ばし、アデリアの頭を優しくなでた。{/n}「涙はいつか枯れる、アデリア。いつか悲しみを乗り越えて、あなたはもっと強くなる。あなたの勇気は決してなくならない」

languages.text: {n}Argentas Gesichtsausdruck wird weicher. Sie streckt eine Hand aus und streicht Adelia sanft übers Haar.{/n} "Die Tränen gehen vorüber, Adelia. Die Tränen gehen vorüber, die Kraft kehrt zurück, und dein Mut wird dich niemals verlassen."
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's face softens. She reaches out and gently strokes Adelia's head.{/n} "The tears will pass, Adelia. The tears will pass, the strength will return, and your courage will never leave you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argentas Gesichtsausdruck wird weicher. Sie streckt eine Hand aus und streicht Adelia sanft übers Haar.{/n} "Die Tränen gehen vorüber, Adelia. Die Tränen gehen vorüber, die Kraft kehrt zurück, und dein Mut wird dich niemals verlassen."

languages.text: {n}Le visage d'Argenta s'adoucit et elle tend la main pour caresser tendrement la tête d'Adélia.{/n} « Les larmes passeront, Adélia. Les larmes passeront, la force reviendra et ton courage ne te quittera jamais. »
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's face softens. She reaches out and gently strokes Adelia's head.{/n} "The tears will pass, Adelia. The tears will pass, the strength will return, and your courage will never leave you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le visage d'Argenta s'adoucit et elle tend la main pour caresser tendrement la tête d'Adélia.{/n} « Les larmes passeront, Adélia. Les larmes passeront, la force reviendra et ton courage ne te quittera jamais. »

languages.text: {n}Argenta'nın yüzü yumuşuyor. Elini uzatıp nazikçe Adelia'nın başını okşuyor.{/n} "Gözyaşların dinecek Adelia. Gözyaşların dinecek ve gücünü geri kazanacaksın. Cesaret seni asla yalnız bırakmayacak."
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's face softens. She reaches out and gently strokes Adelia's head.{/n} "The tears will pass, Adelia. The tears will pass, the strength will return, and your courage will never leave you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta'nın yüzü yumuşuyor. Elini uzatıp Adelia'nın başını okşuyor.{/n} "Bu günler de geçecek Adelia. Bu günler de geçecek ve gücünü geri kazanacaksın. Cesaret seni asla yalnız bırakmayacak."
